A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A decent mainstream science fiction movie if it were not part of the Star Wars franchise. The movie is clearly targeted at a younger audience and has been strongly influenced\, for better or worse by current political positions.

The sense of humour in the movie\, although funny and probably fitting for Guardians of the Galaxy it a little too slapstick and immature for what most fans would expect from a star wars movie. As a related element the villains of the piece have been stripped of all menace or gravitas becoming comically incompetent.

The pacing of the movie is poor\, it is far too long while simultaneously feeling rushed and weakly explained. 

The messages of the movie seem inconsistent with the previous Star Wars mythos while also managing to seem inconsistent within the movie itself.

It remains to be seen whether Abrams can rescue the franchise.
